# [Interview #1083: When Worlds Collide 2014 - Jeremy, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1083#1)

#### Jeremy

What is the home planet of the Ones Above (from
*Sixth of the Dusk*
)?

#### Brandon Sanderson (Paraphrased)

They are from a planet you have seen before.
